info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 5 at 9:35AM CDT by NWS Memphis TN
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi...
Tombigbee River at Bigbee
For the Tombigbee River...including Bigbee...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Tombigbee River at Bigbee.
* WHEN...From Sunday afternoon until further notice.
* IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Residential areas on Hood Road near the river are flooded. Extensive agricultural flooding is occurring.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 8.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow afternoon and continue rising to a crest of 19.3 feet early Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis.
The next statement will be issued as needed.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE
